text:
java.lang.NullPointerException
     at java.util.Hashtable.put(Hashtable.java:380)
     at org.apache.tomcat.core.ServerSession.setAttribute(ServerSession.java:256)
     at
org.apache.tomcat.facade.HttpSessionFacade.setAttribute(HttpSessionFacade.java:204)
     at Myservlet.load(Myservlet.java:718)
creator: based@free.fr

text:
The Servlet 2.2 spec does not allow passing null as the value to setAttribute.  
If you need this, you must upgrade to 4.x (where it is allowed in the spec).

However, it is probably better to throw an IAE than an NPE in this case, so I'm 
leaving this open.
creator: william.barker@wilshire.com
william.barker@wilshire.com
text: Hopefully this can be addressed in 3.3.3.
